1.0.name: wordpress/freebiesms-free-sms-plugin
1.0.description:
Thanks to Martin Fitzpatrick at MuTube we've now got a Free SMS plugin for Wordpress, making it easy to send SMS messages from your wordpress page.

Personally, I found the default theme not to suit the plugin, so I changed theme to Vigilance 1.47 by The Theme Foundry

To change the affiliate ID in the wordpress admin section go to 'Settings' and there should be a tab in there for 'FreebieSMS' click on that and the affiliate number is in there.

Please visit our website at http://www.freebiesms.co.uk, or visit our blog at freebiesms.blogspot.com
